EmailTemplate.name: GCC Webinar.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: REMINDER: FMS GCC Special Topics Webinar TOMORROW
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero?rf=107633562593387> <http://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero> <http://www.youtube.com/honeywell> <https://plus.google.com/109803702550636260475> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace> Email Title Honeywell Aerospace FMS GCC Special Topics Webinar You're invited to participate in the Honeywell Aerospace Pilot Training webinar, hosted by Brock Graham - Honeywell Program Pilot. The webinar agenda topics will include:
- The Global Customer Committee - 100 Waypoint Limitation - Special Instrument Procedures - SID-STAR Common Waypoint - Honeywell Pilot Gateway
Date: Wednesday, July 16, 2014
Time: 09:00 - 10:00 AM (GMT-7) Duration: 60 minutes
Click here to register > <http://pages3.honeywell.com/GCC-Webinar_Register-LP.html> Privacy Statement <http://honeywell.com/Privacy> Terms & Conditions <http://honeywell.com/Pages/TermsConditions.aspx> © 2014 Honeywell International Inc. <http://www.honeywell.com>
